Description:
Develop technical solutions and strategies in project management, construction management, civil engineering, or a related field
Research and issue reports, develop presentations, and propose software solutions
Ensure accuracy and accountability in coding, editing, and writing reports, letters, and memos
Maintain files, records, and documents using applicable software systems and procedures
Assist with training staff on the use of various software programs
Assist with budgeting and scheduling
Procure goods and services, including vendors and consultants
Attend conferences and trade shows to broaden professional knowledge and network
Maintain hardware and software inventories
Perform other related duties as required and assignedSkills
Skills:
Bachelor’s degree in planning, engineering, or related field
7+ years’ experience in civil engineering or transportation planning
